title: Plat Top Main looking to join a team.
body:
Hello everyone, I have been looking for a while looking to take League of Legends seriously. Any positions available would be awesome!

Cheers, IGN: ArdenRoy

replies.body:
Your CS is awful and you die way too much for a Top laner.

This is OCE, I guess. You can get away with it.
get good at jungling and if ur on my team ban ur jungler select
